what's mounted on /?  that'll be your filesystem.
/dev/root
paste that whole line. (one line please)

ctime == "change time";  as in, the last change to the file's metadata.  In the case of a file that was just created, ctime happens to be the creation time, but if the file's metadata is altered then it's no longer the same.
